content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production (Position 0,0 and 2,0)
Two furnaces dedicated to producing iron plates:
- Furnace 1 at (0,0) with coal fuel (22) and no ingredients
- Furnace 2 at (2,0) with coal fuel (23) and no ingredients
Both furnaces are idle due to lack of ingredients

### Copper Plate Production (Position 4,4 and 6,4)
Two furnaces dedicated to producing copper plates:
- Furnace 3 at (4,4) with coal fuel (27) and no ingredients
- Furnace 4 at (6,4) with coal fuel (27) and no ingredients
Both furnaces are idle due to lack of ingredients

### Power Generation System (Position -7.5, 18.5)
Complete power generation setup consisting of:
- Steam engine at (-7.5, 18.5), working status, containing 200 steam at 165°
- Boiler at (-7.5, 22.0), working with 2 coal, containing water (199.99) and steam (199.93)
- Offshore pump at (-7.5, 25.5), working status, containing water (99.93)
- Connected pipe groups:
  - Steam pipes at (-7.5, 15.5)
  - Empty pipes at (-7.5, 20.5)
  - Water pipes at (-8.5, 23.5)
- Electricity distribution network with multiple poles covering areas from (-2.5,7.5) to (7.5,21.5)

### Research Lab Network
Multiple labs set up for logistics research:
- Two working labs with automation science packs (174 and 35 packs respectively)
- Several labs awaiting science packs
- One lab without power connection
All powered labs are connected to the electricity network (ID 1957)

ERROR TIPS

### Lab Placement Errors
- Multiple failed attempts to place lab due to [processing] errors
- Ensure the target location is clear of other entities before placing lab
- Verify you have lab in inventory before attempting to place it
- Check if the placement area is within buildable terrain

### Entity Access and Pickup Errors
- Verify entity existence at specified coordinates before attempting to access or pickup
- When accessing lab entity, ensure proper position coordinates are used
- Use proper error handling when entities are not found at expected locations

### Research Setup Issues
- Check if technology is already researched before attempting to research it again
- Ensure labs have power connection before starting research
- Verify science pack requirements and availability before initiating research

### Resource Management
- Monitor coal levels in boiler to prevent fuel depletion
- Maintain sufficient materials for crafting required items
- Keep track of ingredient requirements for complex crafting chains

### Crafting Chain Management
- Ensure all prerequisite materials are available before starting complex crafting chains
- For electronic circuits, verify copper cable and iron plate availability
- When crafting labs, ensure all components (transport belts, iron gear wheels, electronic circuits) are available
- Consider furnace availability when crafting items requiring smelted materials
